settings.html: Headphone Connect is Indiaâ€™s biggest community event for Audiophiles and Headphone enthusiasts.Â First hosted in 2015, Headphone Connect is a unique audio show and community meetup combined in one. Headphone Connect features the world's finest Headphone brands coming together to showcase the latest from the world of high-end personal audio, headphones, and portable sound. Join the Indian audiophile community for to meet and share with fellow audiophiles from across India. Rediscover your music and listen like never before.

settings.title: Experience Music Like Never Before
settings.content:
Headphone Connect is Indiaâ€™s biggest personal audio community event, with the finest high end personal audio brands from around the world on showcase with the latest in personal audio technology and products available, for Indiaâ€™s discerning music listeners and audiophiles.

Whether youâ€™re a seasoned audiophile or a beginner enthusiast who is new to the hobby, the only qualification needed to join us at Headphone Connect is a love for music, and the passion to listen to it better.

settings.title: Indiaâ€™s Biggest Audiophile Community Event
settings.content:
Headphone Connect isÂ Indiaâ€™s biggest community event for audiophiles and headphone enthusiasts.Â First started in 2015, Headphone Connect is aÂ unique audio show and community meet up combined in one.Â Over the years, Headphone Connect has now spread across India bringing together the audiophile community in each part of the country with an ever expanding list of destinations each year.

Headphone Connect features theÂ world's finest headphone brandsÂ coming together to showcase the latest from the world of high-end personal audio, headphones, and portable sound. Join the Indian audiophile community for to meet and share with fellow audiophiles from across India.

settings.author: Nihal Sharma
settings.content: The energy of the whole event was on a different level. From the young people to people over 50, everyone was equally excited.

settings.author: Prateek Kadgaonkar
settings.content: Had so much fun, got to try so many fantastic headphones! Already missing it and eagerly waiting for the next connect!

settings.author: Siddhartha Dixit
settings.content: The entire event was well planned and managed. The team was very encouraging and helpful.

settings.author: Sudhir Khokhar
settings.content: It's a boon to us audio enthusiasts that we get to try countless audio equipments under one roof near our own city.

settings.author: Purushothaman Munusamy
settings.content: Iâ€™m not an audiophile, but I love great sounding music. Iâ€™ve always wanted to know what these high end audiophile headphones sound like.

settings.author: Sudhir Kulkarni
settings.content: There is nowhere else in india where you get this combination of equipment and experienced and enthusiastic people to help you in your IEM/ headphone appreciation journey.

settings.title: 9 Years Of ConnectingÂ Audiophiles
settings.content: Headphone Connect started as a bunch of friends who came together to share their love for music in 2015, but quickly grew to become Indiaâ€™s biggest audiophile community event. Since then, Headphone Connect has had over 45 successful events across India, with over 5000 audiophiles having attended our community events.

settings.title: You've Never Heard Your Music Like This Before
settings.content: Like you, we love music. And at Headphone Connect, we want to make sure that you rediscover your music and help you enjoy the riffs, bass lines and solos that were always there, but never heard.

settings.title: Experience the World's Finest Headphones under One Roof
settings.content: At Headphone Connect, we believe that a headphone is more than just an instrument for sound. It's the key to a mind-blowing moment of emotion, bringing you closer to your favourite artist, and yourself.

settings.title: Connect with Like-Minded Audiophiles
settings.content: India's home to a vibrant audiophile community. If you thought you were the only one, you'll be surprised to discover common ground and make new friends with fellow audiophiles.

settings.title: Experience with the Best of the Best Expertly Curated Setups
settings.content: You'll have the chance to hear the best of the best and discover a whole new way of listening to music. With our expertly curated lineup of personal audio gear and setups, you'll be treated to an experience that will leave you breathless.

settings.title: Celebrating a Common Love for Music
settings.content: At Headphone Connect, we're not just about showcasing the latest audio innovations - we're about celebrating our love for music. Imagine your favourite artist, album or song. A Headphone is the key to a mind-blowing moment of emotion bringing you closer to your favourite artist, and yourself. We invite you to join us on a journey to rediscover your music in a way youâ€™ve never heard before.Â

settings.title: A BYOG: Bring Your Own GearÂ Event
settings.content: Headphone Connect is first and foremost a community gathering. We invite you to bring your audio setup, whether it's a pair of headphones a portable or desktop listening setup and share your expertise with the community. In a matter of hours, connect with fellow audiophiles, share your gear, and discover every audiophile's perfect setup and hundreds of new ways to enhance your listening experience. Just to be clear it's absolutely not mandatory to bring your gear but encouraged.

settings.title: For Both Beginners and Seasoned Audiophiles
settings.content: Whether you're just starting your audio journey or a seasoned audiophile, we welcome you to Headphone Connect. Our event is designed to cater to all levels of audiophiles, from those new to the hobby to those starting on a journey to rediscover their music and seeking to elevate their listening experience.

settings.title: Not met us before? Come say Hi!
settings.content: The team from Headphone Zone are super passionate about music and audio. We absolutely love what we do. And weâ€™re committed to helping you take your music-listening experience to the next level. Weâ€™re usually wearing Blue and a big bright smile. Say hello! We'll be happy to chat about our audio journey and music on our playlist.

settings.author: Deepti Thomas
settings.title: Exceptionally PHENOMENAL Experience!
settings.content: Headphone Connect was an amazing experience created by the amazing team who truly listen to you and your preferences, they don't rush you, but genuinely care to understand your interests

settings.author: Aayushmaan G.
settings.title: A fulfilling adventure
settings.content: In an environment where audio enthusiasts are seldom recognised, Headphone Connect rejuvenates your soul. You have to experience this for yourself to fully indulge yourself in new musical frontiers.

settings.author: Balaji DÂ
settings.title: Memorable moments
settings.content: Had a great time experiencing different audio equipmentsItâ€™s always a pleasure seeing same mindset people with passion for sound.

settings.author: Manoj V
settings.title: Audiogasm Festival Par Excellence!
settings.content: Attending the Headphone Connect event at the Taj Palace in New Delhi was a dream come true. The opportunity to see all types of audiophile equipment, including some of the most drool-worthy IEMs and headphones, under one roof was one that no audiophile should pass up.

settings.author: Purushothaman MunusamyÂ
settings.title: Thanks for making my dream come true!
settings.content: Iâ€™m not an audiophile, but I love great sounding music. Iâ€™ve always wanted to know what these high end audiophile headphones sound like.

settings.author: Kiran BabuÂ
settings.title: Top Class Products on Display
settings.content: I had great experiance at Headphone Zone Event at Banglore.Had Chance to try all the Topline IEMs and Headphones at one place.I Had great interaction with Raghav and enjoyed a lot. and by the way the snacks and coffee was great.

settings.author: Radhikarani SenguptaÂ
settings.title: Amazing experience!
settings.content:
Got to try so many different brands, types and sound signatures at one go! The folks from headphone zone were very helpful and encouraging.
I discovered that money isn't the only criterion to consider when choosing a headphone. Find a mix of comfort, sound signature and budget that works for your type of music.Thank you headphone zone .

settings.author: Soumen Ghosh
settings.title: A great experience
settings.content: The event was great. Got to meet some awesome people. It does make you feel that you are not the only crazy person in the ever expanding hobby. I got to try lot of great portable and not so portable audio systems. I would be waiting for this event again somewhere in the distant future.

settings.author: Kamalasish Deb
settings.title: Amazing experience. Best Saturday ever..
settings.content: The fact that I was able to listen to all those audio equipments that my heart desired at one place was truly overwhelming. I was like Mr. Bean in the episode where he goes for the Black Friday sale..ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚

settings.author: Nithin Ayathan
settings.title: A big thank you to Headphone Zone
settings.content: The Headphone Connect event was a rare treat for audiophiles. Having the chance to not only test out headphones but also experiment with various DAC setups was invaluable. It provided a comprehensive understanding of the nuances between different setups, allowing for informed decisions. The event offered a unique opportunity to experience top-notch audio quality firsthand, making it a must-visit for anyone serious about their sound experience.

settings.author: Kishore Bhargava
settings.title: Head-fun Connect
settings.content: If you like music and meeting like-minded people, then a Headphone Connect is the place to be. The added advantage is that you get to try the best of the best. My second time at a Headphone Connect and I was more prepared, I had my own gear for reference, I had my own playlist carefully curated to show off various characteristics of sound on good headphones and I was open to try new gear and new music. The four hours I spent there went by so fast.

settings.author: Nirmal VargheseÂ
settings.title: Headphone Zone have put in a tremendous effort
settings.content: Well organised, courteous staff, and a wide range of headphones, audiophile and regular. Good to experience the different sound characteristics of electrostatic, planar and dynamic, from various brands. For me the standouts were the Hifiman he 1000se, Dan Clark E3 and the Stax series, including the new SR-X1 with matching energiser. The staff provided expert guidance on selection. A chance to listen first before buying. Going early helped, get's crowded later, at all tables, including iem's. I didn't check out the iem earphones.A big thanks to Raghav and his helpful team. Much appreciated.

settings.title: What Audiophiles Say About Headphone Connect

settings.html:
A BYOG: Bring Your Own Gear Event

Headphone Connect is India's biggest personal audio event, with the finest high end audio brands on showcase with the latest in personal audio technology and products available for India's discerning music listeners and audiophiles. Whether you're a seasoned audiophiles or beginner enthusiasts who is new to the hobby, the only qualification needed to join us at Headphone Connect is a love for music, and the passion to listen it better.


8 Years Of Connecting Audiophiles

Headphone Connect started as a bunch of friends who came together to share their music in 2015, but quickly grew to become Indiaâ€™s biggest audiophile community event. Since then, Headphone Connect has had 30 successful events across India, with over 2000 patrons having attended our community events.

settings.content: Are you extremely proud of your audio equipment?You certainly deserve a platform to share your knowledge and be appreciated for your taste of audioware and sensibilities. This is exactly what headphonezone.in, a portal for premium audio equipment is offering at The Barking Deer this weekend.
In a room full of audiophiles and hundreds of headphone gear, baby steps feel like a sensory free-fall but once you've experienced that weightlessness of your Headphone Zone, there's no turning back.

If tone, timbre, balance and soundstage be your lifeâ€™s symphony, hereâ€™s some good news: no youâ€™re not alone. In fact there are many of you. And hereâ€™s a meet-up that will be music to your ears -literally. Meet Headphone Connect.

The Audeze LCD-3, a headphone so good that it was dubbed as Voice of God at CES Las Vegas, will be one of the high-end headsets at Headphone Connect, a fest organised by Headphone Zone, an e-retail portal, for audio and music enthusiasts in Delhi this week.

settings.title: Experience Music like Never Before
settings.content:
Headphone Connect is India's biggest personal audio event, with the finest high end audio brands on showcase with the latest in personal audio technology and products available for India's discerning music enlisteners and audiophiles.

Wheather you're a seasoned audiophiles or beginner enthusiasts who is new to the hobby, the only qualification needed to join us at Headphone Connect is a love for music, and the passion to listen it better.

settings.title: A Byog - Bring Your Own Gear Event
settings.content: Headphone Connect is all about interaction and discovery. The Indian Audiophile community comes together at Headphone Connect to celebrate our common passion for music, but also to educate, share and learn the nuances of the hobby. So whether your a beginner, or a seasoned audiophile, we encourage you to bring your own listening setups, and join us on our community tables to showcase and share you you listen to music.

Music is a universal language and everyone loves listening to their favourite artist.
An audiophile is a hobbyist whoâ€™s not just passionate about music, but also cares very deeply about the way the music sounds.

At the core of it, being an audiophile is all about music listening, but in a way that the artist intended it to be heard.

settings.title: Chord - Hugo TT2
settings.content: Precise, Powerful & Portable - thatâ€™s what the Hugo TT2 offers. An incredible combo from the British audio royalty Chord Electronics.

settings.title: HiFiMAN - Susvara
settings.content: A true endgame planar magnetic headphone in every sense. Nothing compares to this beast in sound and technical prowess.Â

settings.title: Meze - ELITE
settings.content: A masterclass in great design and attention to detail - the Elite is a headphone unlike any. A gift to audiophiles from Romania.Â

settings.title: Vision Ears - PHÃ¶NIX
settings.content: Beautifully designed, tastefully tuned and an absolute joy to listen to. Phoenix showcases German Engineering at it best. Â

settings.title: STAX - SR-009S
settings.content: This E-Stat headphone is like an electron microscope for audio. Quiet literally the king of detail retrieval and an absolute legend in every sense.Â

settings.title: 64 Audio - FourtÃ©
settings.content: 64 Audioâ€™s TOTL killer - the FourtÃ© is the choice of countless Pop stars across the globe. A shining jewel in our line-up of flagship IEMs

settings.title: Audeze - LCD-5
settings.content: LCD 5 nails every aspect of being a flagship headphone. Lightweight, Powerful and Resolving and as always leading the pack of planar headphones.Â

settings.title: Woo Audio - WA7
settings.content: Equal parts functional and classy, this desktop tube DAC & Amp offers the whole shebang! Marvel at its beauty and sound.

settings.title: Final - D8000
settings.content: Truly an innovative planar magnetic headphone showcasing the finest Japanese engineering and design. Not one to miss out!

Headphone Connect started as a bunch of friends who came together to share their music in 2015, but quickly grew to become Indiaâ€™s biggest audiophile community event.

Since then, Headphone Connect has had 25 successful events across India, with over 2000 patrons having attended our community events.

Some of the Participating Brands

settings.title: How much does a Headphone Connect Access Pass cost?
settings.content: A Headphone Connect Access Pass costs Rs. 1,499.

settings.title: What does the Headphone Connect Access Pass include?
settings.content: In short, it's your ticket to audiophile bliss. It's your opportunity to rediscover your favourite music on the world's finest headphones that we've heard a lot of audiophiles describe as "priceless". In addition to listening to headphones and IEMs, you will get to meet people who "get" you and your love for sound and make some friends. The Access Pass also treats you to a delightful High Tea experience.

settings.title: Do I need to get my set-up along?
settings.content: It is a BYOG (Bring Your Own Gear) event. You're welcome to get any audio gear you have along. If you're carrying a desktop setup, you can setup your systems on our community table. Kindly carry your extension cords. This event is all about sharing.

settings.title: Is Headphone Connect only open to audiophiles?
settings.content: Headphone Connect is all about interactions and discovery. Both seasoned hobbyists and casual listeners are welcome.

settings.title: What headphones can I listen to?
settings.content: We have gear from some of the finest brands in the world like Astell&Kern, Audeze, Chord Electronics, FiiO, HiFiMAN, and many more. The team carries 400 KGs of headphones, IEMs, DACs and DAPs to the event. The IEM bar (incidentally the most happening area at the event) has over 50 IEMs from brands like 64 Audio, Vision Ears, Noble Audio, 7HZ, Final Audio, KZ, Moondrop, 1Custom & more. We have also dedicated tables for Headphones from Audeze, STAX, Meze Audio, Focal, HEDD Audio, and more. World class headphones are driven by the finest amps and DACs from brands like Chord Electronics, Burson Audio, Gustard, TOPPING, iFi Audio. The IEMs are driven by High Resolution Digital Audio Players from brands like Astell&Kern, Cayin, FiiO, and iBasso. Honestly, you'll have to keep the entire day free so that you can make the most of the event

settings.title: There's a particular headphone I want to listen to, can I request it in advance?
settings.content: If thereâ€™s something specific you want to listen to, speak to one of our Gurus and we'll try our best to get those for you.

settings.title: I don't know anything about audiophilia. Can I still come?
settings.content: There will be plenty of people to guide you on how to listen to music on various headphone systems.

settings.title: Is there a dress code for the event?
settings.content: Yes, because why not! You can pick up an Audiophile T-shirt here. But don't sweat it, it's not a compulsion.

settings.title: Can I change the location after registration / Will I get a refund if I cancel?
settings.content: No, unfortunately, a change of location wonâ€™t be possible. You could cancel your existing registration and re-register for the location you want to attend. Any cancellations would be non-refundable.

settings.title: My friend just arrived in town. Can I get him/her along? Do I need to get them to register?
settings.content: Yes! The more the merrier. Just remember to get them to register for the event in advance.

settings.title: Will you guys have on-the-spot registrations?
settings.content: No, since weâ€™ve capped the event to 100 - 200 attendees, we need to ensure that we provide a firm number to our venue partners. We wonâ€™t be able to take spot registrations at the venue hence.

settings.title: Can I give my Headphone Connect Access Pass to my friend if I'm unable to attend?
settings.content: Sure. Just tell your friend to mention that he/she will be taking your place at the Headphone Connect.

settings.title: If I like something, can I buy it on the spot?
settings.content: No, you can't. JK, we're an online store and you can simply pull out your phone at the event and place orders directly on our website.

settings.title: Can I get my kid along? Do I need to register for him/her?
settings.content: Headphone Connect is open to people of all ages. If you want to give your little one a taste of audiophilia, definitely bring him/her along! PS: Kids don't need to be registered under 12 years.
